hint: Trade crystals to {npc:1016289}
Trade crystals to {npc:1016289}

steps.hint: To get started on your Anima weapon, you need to do FATEs in each of the listed zones until you get the corresponding Luminous Crystal. Once you have all the crystals, turn them in to {npc:1016289} for your upgrade materials.
Complete the duties given by your quest with the relic weapon equipped. It is sufficient to have the relic weapon equipped when exiting the duty, you can swap to a better weapon while doing it.

steps.hint2: You need to acquire {item:13577}, {item:13578}, {item:13579} and {item:13580} for this step. You trade for them with these materials: {item:13582}, {item:13584}, {item:13586} and {item:13588} can be bought from tomestone vendors, acquired by trading materials from the first tier of the alexander normal raids, traded for with heavensward tribal tokens or from treasure maps/allied seals. {item:13589},{item:13591},{item:13593} and {item:13595} can be crafted, bought from the market board or bought with grand company seals.
hints: You have to acquire the following items:
{bullet:0} {item:13577}
{bullet:0} {item:13578}
{bullet:0} {item:13579}
{bullet:0} {item:13580}
To get them, you have to first get some other items to trade in. You need 10 each of these, bought with tomestones:
{bullet:0} {item:13582}
{bullet:0} {item:13584}
{bullet:0} {item:13586}
{bullet:0} {item:13588}
And you also need 4 each of these, bought with GC credits, from the marketboard or crafted yourself:
{bullet:0} {item:13589}
{bullet:0} {item:13591}
{bullet:0} {item:13593}
{bullet:0} {item:13595}

steps.hint: Easy step: Buy 5 {item:14899}, turn them in to upgrade your weapon.

For this step, you need to acquire enough {item:15840} and {item:15841} to upgrade your weapon. The exact amount can vary due to RNG, but about 60 of each should do it most of the time. {item:15840} can be directly bought with tomestomes, {item:15841} must be traded for with other items. Your best options for this are trading crafter's or gatherer's scrip tokens, or buying {item:7885} and {item:6268} with tomestomes then trading those for {item:15841}. If using all tomestomes, the total cost for this step is about 11 250.
You can get singing clusters by doing the daily quest {quest:67917}, the weekly quest {quest:67916} or, as per usual, spending tomestones (2000 in this case).

hints: Accept your quest and as instructed, complete [Sohm Al (Hard)], [The Great Gubal Library (Hard)] and [The Lost City of Ampdapor (Hard)] as your corresponding job with the weapon either equipped or in your inventory.

Next, you must farm aetheric density which is gained via most activities that involve combat such as completing FATEs, trials, dungeons or raids with your weapon equipped. An efficient method is to farm [Alexander - The Eyes of the Creator (Savage)] unsynced 20 times.
Lastly, you need to acquire a {item:16932} from the {npc:1018340} by trading it 15 {item:16933} which are bought with tomestones or GC seals.
To finish your relic weapon, you have to complete 12 trials as indicated by your quest. This is done in 4 steps of 3/4/2/3 trials each.
For the finishing touch, purchase 1 {item:16934} for 500 tomestones. Turn in your quest and you are done!

steps.hint: You get this weapon by completing your level 70 job quest. If you have lost it, you can buy it again from the {npc:1006004}.

You can get {item:21801} by defeating enemies in Eureka Anemos. You can also speak to {npc:0}[put gerolt here] and trade in {item:21803} for up to 5 Protean Crystals each. Anemos Crystals are obtained by defeating notorious monsters in Eureka.
You will need 1300-2200 Protean Crystals in total for the next steps.
You got 100, good job! Now Gerolt wants 400 more.
400 was too easy, right? Try 800 next.

For the last step in Anemos, you need to collect 3 {item:21802}. You have two options to get these: The first is to spawn the Pazuzu notorious monster and defeat it while at rank 19 or above and you will get all 3 feathers. Due to its spawn conditions, it may be a while before you get this option - alternatively you can just buy the feathers for 300 Protean Crystals each from the expedition birdwatcher in the area. Check the table on the right for their location!

You continue the relic in Eureka Pagos. After reaching rank 25, speak to Gerolt to acquire the kettle - you need this to obtain {item:23309}s. You can acquire up to 9 charges for your kettle by defeating level-appropriate monsters and notorious monsters. Go to the {object:2009555} to turn the accumulated aether into Frosted Protean Crystals.

hints: If this is your first Shadowbringers relic, you can get the weapon for free by completing the quest chain beginning with {quest:69370}.
Otherwise, buy 4 {item:30273} and trade them for your weapon.

hint: Random drop from enemies, FATEs and critical engagements in zone 1 of the bozjan southern front

Hints: You need to get 20 of each memory:
Farming FATEs in Heavensward zones is the fastest and most consistent way. Note that the quest must be active for you to be able to drop crystals.

hint: Guaranteed to drop from daily leveling roulette
Guaranteed to drop from level 60 dungeons
Random drop from enemies in the bozjan southern front

hints: This step is quite easy - you can go to the beginning of the Bozjan Southern Front, pull as many enemies as you can and beat them down for consistent drops of {item:31576}.
A tank using a beast elixir is great for this. The quest must be active for you to be able to get the drops!

hint: 5 from finishing Castrum Lacus Litore
1 from clearing any Crystal Tower raid
Random drop from critical engagements in the bozjan southern front

hints: The most consistent way to get {item:32956} is doing the Castrum Lacus Litore engagement in Bozja - which unfortunately only spawns about once per hour.
I recommend doing FATEs and spawning CEs in Bozja while waiting, giving you a chance at crystal drops and reducing the cooldown of CLL.

Random drop from FATEs in {map:367} {map:368} {map:369}
3 from completing any Stormblood alliance raid
Random drop from FATEs in {map:371} {map:372} {map:354}

hints: One-Time step. Gather these crystals and turn them in:
{bullet:0}, 18 {item:32957}

The dropchance from FATEs is decent and a good option to grind them.

hint: Random drop from Palace of the Dead
3 from completing Delubrum Reginae

hints: You have two options to get your {item:32959}:
In POTD you only have a disappointing chance to get 1 drop per 10 floors cleared, so I do not recommend it.

To run Delubrum Reginae efficiently, open a party finder for 8 players and ensure everybody brings appropriate essences and actions - it will speed up the runs tremendously. Here is a slightly outdated, but still very useful guide to loadouts for Delubrum Reginae: https://imgur.com/y0jNEno
Note that after queueing up for Delubrum Reginae via the npc, there is a 10 minute delay before the queue pop thanks to the game trying to party you up with people for a duty nobody runs.

hint: 1 from FATEs in zone 1 of zadnor
1 per synced Alexander raid clear (raid 1,2,5,6,9,10)
2 from critical engagements in zone 1 of zadnor
1 per synced Alexander raid clear (raid 3,4,7,8,11,12)

hints: First, note that this step can be done simultaneously with the other one-time steps. Each requires you to do FATEs and Critical Engagements in one of the Zadnor zones or running specific normal raids.
I heartily recommend doing FATEs and CEs in Zadnor instead of going crazy from running 180 old and synced normal raids.

hints: The last step! You can choose to either run a bunch of Dalriada (if you are at the end of the Bozja storyline) or hunt more Delubrum Reginae again to get your {item:33767}

steps.hint: Buy the required items from the vendor to upgrade your relic.
